message.name: PROVIDER_ENROLLMENT_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been enrolled as a provider with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s. Your approval to provide services to clients of this agency is pending successful completion of the necessary validation and verification processes.

message.name: PROVIDER_REJECTION_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been denied approval to provide services to clients of this agency. The reason for rejection is as follows: %1s.

message.name: PROVIDER_APPROVAL_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been approved as a provider with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_SUSPENSION_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been suspended as a provider with our agency under Reference No. %1s. You have been suspended for the following reason: %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_CLOSURE_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you are no longer an active provider with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_REOPENING_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been re-opened as a provider with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s. Your approval to provide services to clients of this agency is pending re-validation and verification of the necessary processes.

message.name: PROVIDER_GROUP_ENROLLMENT_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been enrolled as a provider group with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_GROUP_CLOSURE_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you are no longer an active provider group with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_GROUP_REOPENING_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been re-opened as a provider group with our agency under Reference No. %1s effective as of %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_SERVICE_OFFERING_APPROVAL_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been approved to provide %1s to clients of this agency starting from %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_SERVICE_OFFERING_APPROVAL_DENIAL_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: We wish to inform you that you have been denied approval to provide %1s to clients of this agency. The denial reason is as follows: %2s.

message.name: PROVIDER_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATED_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: The service offering %1s has been end dated.

message.name: PROVIDER_SERVICE_OFFERING_END_DATED_NOTIFICATION_COMMENTS
message.locale: The service offering %1s has been end dated. Providers providing this service offering are %2s.
